statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE intersection_id=1
SELECT vehicle_count FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE average_speed > 60
SELECT timestamp, vehicle_count FROM TrafficAnalysis ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT intersection_id, average_speed FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE vehicle_count < 100 ORDER BY intersection_id
SELECT AVG(vehicle_count), MAX(average_speed) FROM TrafficAnalysis
SELECT * FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE intersection_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT intersection_id, COUNT(*) as num_records FROM TrafficAnalysis GROUP BY intersection_id HAVING num_records > 100 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT intersection_id, AVG(vehicle_count) as avg_count FROM TrafficAnalysis WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2021-12-31' GROUP BY intersection_id ORDER BY avg_count DESC;
SELECT intersection_id, MAX(average_speed) as max_speed FROM TrafficAnalysis GROUP BY intersection_id HAVING max_speed > 60 ORDER BY max_speed DESC;
SELECT intersection_id, MIN(vehicle_count) as min_count, MAX(vehicle_count) as max_count, AVG(vehicle_count) as avg_count FROM TrafficAnalysis GROUP BY intersection_id ORDER BY intersection_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_volume > 1000
SELECT intersection_id, vehicle_type FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY intersection_id ASC
SELECT intersection_id, vehicle_type FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC
SELECT vehicle_type, AVG(average_speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_patterns GROUP BY vehicle_type
SELECT * FROM signal_timings WHERE green_light_duration < 30
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE vehicle_type = 'car';
SELECT intersection_id, traffic_volume FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT AVG(average_speed) FROM traffic_patterns WHERE intersection_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM signal_timings WHERE red_light_duration > 30;
SELECT intersection_id, green_light_duration, red_light_duration FROM signal_timings WHERE intersection_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Intersection;
SELECT location FROM Intersection WHERE traffic_flow > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, vehicle_speed FROM Vehicle WHERE direction = 'North';
SELECT signal_color FROM Signal ORDER BY signal_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle JOIN Intersection ON Vehicle.intersection_id = Intersection.intersection_id;
SELECT * FROM Intersection;
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_speed, direction FROM Vehicle WHERE intersection_id = 1;
SELECT signal_color, signal_duration FROM Signal ORDER BY signal_duration DESC;
SELECT location, traffic_flow FROM Intersection WHERE traffic_flow > 50;
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_speed, direction, location FROM Vehicle JOIN Intersection ON Vehicle.intersection_id = Intersection.intersection_id ORDER BY vehicle_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_streets;
SELECT street_name, traffic_flow FROM traffic_streets;
SELECT intersection_name, signal_light_color FROM intersection_signals WHERE signal_light_color = 'Red';
SELECT camera_location, camera_status, camera_angle FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, street_id, signal_id, camera_id, traffic_volume, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT street_name, traffic_flow FROM traffic_streets
SELECT * FROM intersection_signals WHERE signal_light_color = 'Red'
SELECT street_name, traffic_density FROM traffic_streets WHERE traffic_density > 0.5 ORDER BY street_name ASC
SELECT intersection_name, signal_duration FROM intersection_signals WHERE signal_duration > 30 ORDER BY signal_duration DESC
SELECT camera_location, camera_status, camera_angle FROM traffic_cameras WHERE camera_status = 'Operational'
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras
SELECT location, is_active FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT intersection_id, signal_color FROM intersection_signals WHERE signal_color = 'RED'
SELECT engineer_name FROM traffic_engineers WHERE engineer_specialty = 'Traffic Management'
SELECT log_id, intersection_id, timestamp FROM signal_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM intersection_signals WHERE signal_color = 'Red' ORDER BY signal_duration DESC;
SELECT traffic_cameras.location, traffic_data.vehicle_count FROM traffic_cameras JOIN traffic_data ON traffic_cameras.camera_id = traffic_data.intersection_id WHERE traffic_cameras.is_active = TRUE;
SELECT engineer_name, engineer_specialty FROM traffic_engineers WHERE engineer_specialty LIKE '%traffic%' ORDER BY engineer_name ASC;
SELECT intersection_id, signal_status, timestamp FROM signal_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY intersection_id;
SELECT intersection_id, MAX(vehicle_count) AS max_vehicle_count FROM traffic_data GROUP BY intersection_id HAVING max_vehicle_count > 100 ORDER BY max_vehicle_count DESC;
